query: Find articles authored by Anshul Gupta or Manisha Srivastava, published in IEEE between 2005 and 2012, excluding 2009, about classifiers or reinforcement learning, especially focusing on the statement: Deep neural networks have revolutionized pattern recognition. Exclude papers mentioning solvability modeling.

keywords.Semantic Query: Deep neural networks have revolutionized pattern recognition.

ground_truth_papers: Offline handwritten character recognition using neural network.
Multifrontal Factorization of Sparse SPD Matrices on GPUs.
